Title: Streaming Median
Statement:
Task. Design a data structure that supports add(x:int) and median()->float for an unbounded stream.

Constraints

O(log n) per insert, O(1) median query using two heaps (low=max-heap, high=min-heap).
Handle negatives, duplicates, and alternating even/odd counts.
Stdlib only (heapq).
Signature

class MedianStream:
    def add(self, x: int) -> None: ...
    def median(self) -> float: ...
